title: Paella

ingredients.name: Spaghetti
ingredients.desc: Long, thin pasta noodles made from durum wheat semolina.

ingredients.name: Eggs
ingredients.desc: Chicken eggs used for cooking and baking.

ingredients.name: Parmesan Cheese
ingredients.desc: A hard, granular cheese with a nutty and salty flavor, made from cow's milk.

ingredients.name: Shrimp
ingredients.desc: Cured and smoked pork belly, often sliced and cooked as a breakfast food.

ingredients.name: Black Pepper
ingredients.desc: A pungent spice made from the dried, unripe berries of the pepper plant.

method: Paella is made with a fragrant saffron-infused broth, loaded with an array of seafood or chicken, vegetables, and spices. It is a hearty and flavorful one-pan meal, perfect for sharing with family and friends.

title: Tortilla Espa√±ola

ingredients.name: Chicken
ingredients.desc: Meat from domesticated birds, often used in cooking.

ingredients.name: Yogurt
ingredients.desc: A dairy product made by fermenting milk with a yogurt culture.

ingredients.name: Tomatoes
ingredients.desc: A fruit used as a vegetable in cooking, with a sweet and slightly sour flavor.

ingredients.name: Spices
ingredients.desc: A mixture of various ground herbs and seeds used to add flavor to food.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.desc: A bulb vegetable with a pungent flavor, often used as a base for cooking.

method: A traditional Spanish omelette made with potatoes and onions, it is a staple dish that can be enjoyed any time of day, from breakfast to a late-night snack. It is easy to make, delicious, and versatile, as you can add other ingredients such as peppers or chorizo to make it your own.

title: Gazpacho

ingredients.name: Beef
ingredients.desc: Meat from cows, typically used for cooking steaks, roasts, and ground beef.

ingredients.name: Sour Cream
ingredients.desc: A dairy product commonly used as a condiment or ingredient in recipes.

ingredients.name: Onions
ingredients.desc: A vegetable with a distinctive flavor and odor, commonly used in cooking.

ingredients.name: Mushrooms
ingredients.desc: Fleshy fungi that are commonly used in cooking and have a meaty texture and flavor.

method: A refreshing cold soup made with fresh vegetables, bread, and olive oil, Gazpacho is perfect for hot summer days. It is a healthy and flavorful dish that is easy to make, and can be served as a light appetizer or a refreshing main course.

title: Patatas Bravas

ingredients.name: Tomatoes
ingredients.desc: A round or oblong fruit with a juicy pulp, used as a vegetable in cooking.

ingredients.name: Mozzarella Cheese
ingredients.desc: A soft, mild cheese made from buffalo or cow's milk, often used in Italian cooking.

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.desc: A fragrant herb used in cooking, especially Italian cuisine.

ingredients.name: Balsamic Vinegar
ingredients.desc: A dark, syrupy vinegar made from grape must, aged in wooden barrels.

method: Patatas Bravas are crispy fried potatoes served with a spicy tomato sauce. It is a hearty and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed as a snack or a side dish. It is easy to make and always a crowd-pleaser.

title: Croquetas

ingredients.name: Chicken Breast
ingredients.desc: Boneless, skinless chicken breast fillets.

ingredients.name: Spinach
ingredients.desc: A green, leafy vegetable rich in iron and other vitamins.

ingredients.name: Feta Cheese
ingredients.desc: A crumbly cheese made from sheep's milk or a mixture of sheep and goat's milk.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.desc: A pungent bulb used as a seasoning in many cuisines.

method: Croquetas are crispy, golden brown bites filled with a creamy mixture of ham or chicken, bechamel sauce, and other seasonings. They are perfect for sharing, and can be served as a starter or a light meal with a salad.

title: Churros

ingredients.name: Pasta
ingredients.desc: A type of Italian noodle typically made from wheat flour and water, and sometimes with eggs or other ingredients.

ingredients.name: Basil Pesto
ingredients.desc: A sauce made from basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil, typically used as a topping for pasta.

ingredients.name: Parmesan Cheese
ingredients.desc: A hard, granular cheese with a nutty and salty flavor, made from cow's milk.

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients.desc: Small, sweet tomatoes typically used in salads and as a garnish.

method: Churros are fried dough pastry that are crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. They are often served with hot chocolate for dipping and are perfect for a sweet snack or a decadent dessert.
